name: Psycho Bob demo
description:
Psycho Bob is a 2.5D run n' gun platform shooter featuring 360° aiming, rag-doll physics, dismemberment, and voluptuous princess rides! Play as a lobotomized lab monkey that unleashes bullets, explosions, fire, amateur kung-fu, and epic guitar solos to decimate hoards of post-apocalyptic clones and mutants!

Created by a lone wolf developer of questionable sanity over the course of 3+ years, this game aims to combine the mechanics of classics like Contra and Metal Slug with the aerobatics of Max Payne and the gore of Evil Dead.

Now on Steam Greenlight! : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=875355540
